articles.title: Marcos, Duterte still leading in Pulse Asia's pre-election survey - Manila Bulletin
articles.content:

articles.title: Minor earthquake jolts Hong Kong - The Star Online
articles.description: HONG KONG (China Daily/Asia News Network): An earthquake of magnitude 4.1 jolted Hong Kong in the early hours of Monday (March 14), according to an initial analysis from the Hong Kong Observatory.

articles.title: Cut off from family and savings, Russians on holiday in South-East Asia count the cost of war - The Star Online
articles.description: When he arrived in Bali nearly two weeks ago, after four days of quarantine in Jakarta, Viktor learnt that his adopted country of Russia had invaded his country of birth, Ukraine.
